description:
After Law discovers the secret to Breed`s power, Luffy and his old friend the Kung Fu Dugong give the animal-abusing madman a beasty beat down!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Major Turnaround! Luffy`s Angry Iron Fist Strikes!
Daigyakuten! Sakuretsu Luffy Ikari no Tekken
Renversement de situation. Luffy explose de colère !
Большое восстановление! Взрывной кулак ярости Луффи
انقلاب الطاولة! يضرب لوفي بلكمته الحديديّة الغاضبة!
大逆転! 炸裂ルフィ怒りの鉄拳
